name: Kyle Petty's No Fear Racing
overview: Customize your car! Change tires...Add horses... Modify gear ratios...Adjust gear ratios...Adjust spoilers! High-end 3D hardware and software gives the most awesome racing graphics ever! Over 2000 race car images! 1 or 2 player racing featuring side-by-side, wheel-to-wheel split screen action! Build your own tracks with S-Curves, Loops and Hair Pin Turns! Or, select from 28 existing Tracks!
